mapper.select:
select c.name as "assigneeName", c.status, c.remark,
DATE_FORMAT(c.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "endTime"
to_char(c.end_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "endTime"
to_char(c.end_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "endTime"
to_char(c.end_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "endTime"
to_char(c.end_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "endTime"
CONVERT(varchar, c.end_time, 120 ) AS "endTime"
FROM sea_instance a LEFT JOIN sea_node b ON b.def_id = a.id LEFT JOIN sea_node_detail c ON c.node_id = b.id
a.business_type = #{businessType} AND a.business_key = #{businessKey} AND c.status IN (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)
ORDER BY c.end_time DESC

SELECT c.id, c.name, c.business_type as "businessType", c.business_key as "businessKey", c.return_number as "returnNumber", d.name as "assigneeName",
DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
CONVERT(varchar, a.create_time, 120 ) AS "createTime"
FROM sea_node_detail a LEFT JOIN sea_node b ON b.id = a.node_id LEFT JOIN sea_instance c ON c.id = b.def_id AND c.version = b.version LEFT JOIN sys_account d ON d.id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_company e ON e.id = c.company_id
a.status = 0 AND b.status = 0 AND b.type IN (1,4) AND a.assignee = #{userId} AND c.status IN (0,1,2,3)
AND c.business_type = #{formId}
AND e.code LIKE CONCAT(#{prefix}, '%')
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} + '%'
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT c.id, c.name, c.business_type as "businessType", c.business_key as "businessKey", d.name as assigneeName,
DATE_FORMAT(a.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.end_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.end_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.end_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.end_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
CONVERT(varchar, a.end_time, 120 ) AS "createTime"
FROM sea_node_detail a LEFT JOIN sea_node b ON b.id = a.node_id LEFT JOIN sea_instance c ON c.id = b.def_id LEFT JOIN sys_account d ON d.id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_company e ON e.id = c.company_id
a.status IN (1,2) AND a.assignee = #{userId}
AND e.code LIKE CONCAT(#{prefix}, '%')
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} + '%'
ORDER BY a.end_time DESC

SELECT a.id, c.name, c.business_type as "businessType", c.business_key as "businessKey", d.name as "assigneeName",
DATE_FORMAT(c.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "createTime"
to_char(c.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(c.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(c.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(c.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
CONVERT(varchar, c.create_time, 120 ) AS "createTime"
FROM sea_node_detail a LEFT JOIN sea_node b ON b.id = a.node_id LEFT JOIN sea_instance c ON c.id = b.def_id LEFT JOIN sys_account d ON d.id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_company e ON e.id = c.company_id
b.type = 2 AND b.status = 1 AND a.assignee = #{userId}
AND e.code LIKE CONCAT(#{prefix}, '%')
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} + '%'
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT a.id, a.name, a.business_type as "businessType", a.business_key as "businessKey", a.current_agent as "assigneeName",
DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
CONVERT(varchar, a.create_time, 120 ) AS "createTime"
FROM sea_instance a LEFT JOIN sys_company b ON b.id = a.company_id
a.user_id = #{userId}
AND a.business_type = #{formId}
AND b.code LIKE CONCAT(#{prefix}, '%')
AND b.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND b.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND b.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND b.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND b.code LIKE #{prefix} + '%'
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT id, title as name, business_type AS "businessType", business_key AS "businessKey",
DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "createTime"
to_char(create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
CONVERT(varchar, create_time, 120 ) AS "createTime"
FROM sys_message
type = 4 AND company_id = #{companyId} AND to_user_id = #{userId}
ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT c.id, c.name, c.business_type as "businessType", c.business_key as "businessKey", d.name as "assigneeName", c.resources, c.status, c.return_number as "returnNumber",
DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
CONVERT(varchar, a.create_time, 120 ) AS "createTime"
FROM sea_node_detail a LEFT JOIN sea_node b ON b.id = a.node_id LEFT JOIN sea_instance c ON c.id = b.def_id AND c.version = b.version LEFT JOIN sys_account d ON d.id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_company e ON e.id = c.company_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_relate f ON f.company_id = c.company_id AND f.user_id = c.user_id
a.status = 0 AND b.status = 0 AND b.type IN (1,4) AND a.assignee = #{userId} AND c.status IN (0,1,2,3)
AND e.code LIKE CONCAT(#{prefix}, '%')
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} + '%'
AND c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND c.name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND c.name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND c.name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND c.name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND c.name LIKE '%' + #{name} + '%'
AND FIND_IN_SET(c.status, #{statusStr})
AND FIND_IN_SET(c.status, #{statusStr})
AND cast(#{statusStr} as VARCHAR) = ANY (STRING_TO_ARRAY(cast(c.status as VARCHAR),','))
AND cast(#{statusStr} as VARCHAR) = ANY (STRING_TO_ARRAY(cast(c.status as VARCHAR),','))
AND position(c.status in #{statusStr})
AND position(c.status in #{statusStr})
AND FIND_IN_SET(c.business_type, #{businessTypeStr})
AND FIND_IN_SET(c.business_type, #{businessTypeStr})
AND cast(#{businessTypeStr} as VARCHAR) = ANY (STRING_TO_ARRAY(cast(c.business_type as VARCHAR),','))
AND cast(#{businessTypeStr} as VARCHAR) = ANY (STRING_TO_ARRAY(cast(c.business_type as VARCHAR),','))
AND position(c.business_type in #{businessTypeStr})
AND position(c.business_type in #{businessTypeStr})
AND find_in_set(f.department_id, #{departmentIds})
AND cast(#{departmentIds} as VARCHAR) = ANY (STRING_TO_ARRAY(cast(f.department_id as VARCHAR),','))
AND cast(#{departmentIds} as VARCHAR) = ANY (STRING_TO_ARRAY(cast(f.department_id as VARCHAR),','))
AND position(f.department_id in #{departmentIds})
AND position(f.department_id in #{departmentIds})
AND position(f.department_id in #{departmentIds})
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT id, title as name, business_type AS "businessType", business_key AS "businessKey",
DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime
to_char(create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS createTime
to_char(create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS createTime
to_char(create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS createTime
to_char(create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS createTime
CONVERT(varchar, create_time, 120 ) AS "createTime"
FROM sys_message
type = 4 AND company_id = #{companyId} AND to_user_id = #{userId}
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
AND title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'
AND title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'
AND title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'
AND title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'
AND title LIKE '%' + #{title} + '%'
ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT c.id, c.name, c.business_type as "businessType", c.business_key as "businessKey",d.name as "assigneeName", c.resources,c.current_agent AS "currentToDoPersons",
DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "createTime",
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime",
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime",
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime",
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime",
CONVERT(varchar, a.create_time, 120 ) AS "createTime"
DATE_FORMAT(a.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "handleTime"
to_char(a.end_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "handleTime"
to_char(a.end_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "handleTime"
to_char(a.end_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "handleTime"
to_char(a.end_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "handleTime"
CONVERT(varchar, a.end_time, 120 ) AS "handleTime"
FROM sea_node_detail a LEFT JOIN sea_node b ON b.id = a.node_id LEFT JOIN sea_instance c ON c.id = b.def_id LEFT JOIN sys_account d ON d.id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_company e ON e.id = c.company_id
a.status IN (1,2) AND a.assignee = #{userId}
AND e.code LIKE CONCAT(#{prefix}, '%')
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} + '%'
AND c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND c.name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND c.name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND c.name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND c.name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND c.name LIKE '%' + #{name} + '%'
ORDER BY a.end_time DESC

SELECT a.id, c.name, c.business_type as "businessType", c.business_key as "businessKey",d.name as "assigneeName", c.resources,
DATE_FORMAT(c.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "createTime"
to_char(c.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(c.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(c.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(c.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
CONVERT(varchar, c.create_time, 120 ) AS "createTime"
FROM sea_node_detail a LEFT JOIN sea_node b ON b.id = a.node_id LEFT JOIN sea_instance c ON c.id = b.def_id LEFT JOIN sys_account d ON d.id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_company e ON e.id = c.company_id
b.type = 2 AND a.assignee = #{userId}
AND e.code LIKE CONCAT(#{prefix}, '%')
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND e.code LIKE #{prefix} + '%'
AND c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND c.name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND c.name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND c.name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND c.name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND c.name LIKE '%' + #{name} + '%'
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT a.id, a.name, a.business_type as "businessType", a.business_key as "businessKey", a.resources, a.current_agent AS "currentToDoPersons",
DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "createTime"
CONVERT(varchar, a.create_time, 120 ) AS "createTime"
FROM sea_instance a LEFT JOIN sys_company b ON b.id = a.company_id
a.user_id = #{userId}
AND b.code LIKE CONCAT(#{prefix}, '%')
AND b.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND b.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND b.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND b.code LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND b.code LIKE #{prefix} + '%'
AND a.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND a.name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND a.name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND a.name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND a.name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND a.name LIKE '%' + #{name} + '%'
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
